original_text:
Listen! Listen to the roar of his voice,
    to the rumbling that comes from his mouth.
korean_text: 하나님의 음성 곧 그의 입에서 나오는 소리를 똑똑히 들으라

sentences.original_text: Listen to the roar of his voice,
to the rumbling that comes from his mouth.
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 입에서 나오는 쾅하는 소리를 들으라.
